bibl.title: Columbia George v. Charles B. Hopkins. Certificate
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21 US Circuit Courts, Western District of Washington, Seattle; Law Register Northern Division, 1899-1906, vol 2

div1.p: United States of America, Western District of Washington.

I, James C. Drake, Clerk of the Circuit Court of the United States, for the Western District of Washington, do hereby certify that the foregoing attached papers constitue the JUDGEMENT ROLL in the foregoing entitled cause No. 1390 wherein in re: application of Columbia George for writ of Habeas Corpus.
In Testimony Whereof, I have hereunto set my ahnd and affixed the Seal of said Circuit Court, this the 21 day of DEC. A.D. 1911.
